This movie in good DVD-quality (DVD5 from R2 japanese DVD + english dub audio) is:

http://asiandvdclub.org/details.php?id=8407&dllist=1

Audio: Dolby AC3 48000Hz 6ch 192Kbps [AC-3]
Video: MPEG2 Video 704x576 (16:9) 25.00fps 9640Kbps [Video]
Quality is acceptable (but seems like it was captured from a TV screen...) Sound also a little shitty (English dubbed). Better this than nothing.
